fr.uga.pddl4j.parser

Class Problem

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.uga.pddl4j.parser.Problem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Problem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a planning problem read by the parser.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Problem(Symbol name)
      Creates a new problem with a specific name.

      • standardize

        public void standardize()
        Normalize the problem. This method renames the variables and then move inward the negation of the goal and the constraints of the problem.
        See Also:
        Op.normalize(), DerivedPredicate.normalize()
